attributes.action: Tax caravanners double due to the agravation and pollution they cause.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned wish the government to tax caravanners double as compensation for the aggravasation they cause the rest of road users and the extra pollution their vehicle causes pulling such an unairdynamic/heavy load.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
